graphql_operation_files.content: mutation CreateUser($username: String!, $email: String!, $provider: String!, $password: String!, $resetPasswordToken: String!, $confirmationToken: String!, $confirmed: Boolean!, $blocked: Boolean!, $role: ID!, $Level: Int!, $userRole: String!, $avatar: Int!, $company: String!, $contact: String!, $plan: String!){backend_createUsersPermissionsUser(data: {username: $username,email: $email,provider: $provider,password: $password,resetPasswordToken: $resetPasswordToken,confirmationToken: $confirmationToken,confirmed: $confirmed,blocked: $blocked,role: $role,Level: $Level,avatar: $avatar,userRole: $userRole,company: $company,contact: $contact,plan: $plan}){data {id}}}
mutation Login($identifier: String!, $password: String!){backend_login(input: {identifier: $identifier,password: $password}){jwt user {id username email}}}
